tables.feed:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_feed` (
  `feed_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `feed_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `about_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `about_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `privacy_type` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `privacy_value` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `params_text` text,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`feed_id`),
  KEY `poster_id` (`poster_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.feed_hash:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_feed_hash` (
  `hash_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`hash_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `name` (`name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.feed_hashtag:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_feed_hashtag` (
  `feed_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `hash_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`feed_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.feed_hidden:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_feed_hidden` (
  `viewer_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `feed_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`viewer_id`,`feed_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.feed_status:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_feed_status` (
  `status_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `parent_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `parent_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `like_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `comment_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `share_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `story` text NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `modified_at` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `privacy_type` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `privacy_value` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `privacy_text` text,
  `people_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `place_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `place_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`status_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.feed_stream:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_feed_stream` (
  `profile_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `feed_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `profile_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `feed_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `about_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `parent_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `privacy_type` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `privacy_value` bigint(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `params_text` text,
  `is_hidden` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`profile_id`,`feed_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.feed_type:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_feed_type` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `feed_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `module_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `show_on_public` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `show_on_parent` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `show_on_poster` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `show_on_main` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `can_share` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `can_like` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `can_comment` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `show_on_tagged` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

core_extension.name: feed
core_extension.title: Feeds
core_extension.author: YouNet Company
core_extension.description:
When participating in a social networking site, are you interested in being updated on the latest activities and connecting to other people by quickly posting new contents, reading, sharing and commenting on other’s contribution? If so, we guarantee that the plugin will serve you well.

Activity is equipped with numerous advanced features. Tag and hash tag provide a fantastic way to mention your friend in a post or a quick search of all feeds that contain certain hash tag. Privacy and Filters help users share their feed to the right people and make their main wall cleaner by filtering out unnecessary feeds. In addition, it provides emoticon and location check-ins which are a must-have on any social network.
